heading: The share of employment in the touristic sector in the EU27 in 2021
subheading: In the entire EU27 as much as 2.44% of all employees are working in the selected tourism industries. Cyprus is leading with 7.7% and Poland has with only 1% the lowest share of employees in the selected tourism industries.
textNote: The data cover the following tourism activities: Air transport, including passenger and freight transport by airlines, Accommodation, and Travel agencies, tour operators and other reservation services. No data given for Estonia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Slovenia and Greece.
